resources.string: Couchsurfing does not have any rules.\nThere is, however, basic etiquette.\nHere is a quiz to test your etiquette.
Enter your name and press the button when you are ready to start!
Is Couchsurfing a free place to stay when you are travelling?
Right. Show your appreciation with a meal, a small gift or some other gesture.
Wrong. Show your appreciation with a meal, a small gift or some other gesture.
Check all the different ways you can participate on Couchsurfing?
Right. Couchsurfing is not for commercial use.
Wrong. Couchsurfing is not for commercial use.
Do you use metal on a teflon pan?
Right. No metal on non-stick pans.
Wrong. No metals, and use a sponge or cloth to clean it.
Right. Couchsurfing is a community. Host before you travel.
Wrong. Couchsurfing is a community. Host before you travel.
